# Tile Image
<!--
@name: Tile Image
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Return the index of the image used to display a tile in the view
## Parameters

- **viewName&dollar;**: Name of the map view
- **tileIndex**: Index of the tile
---
